snippet.title: Point of Mew (Kate Killick and David Rodríguez Madriñán) // The Mini Indie Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
A first-pawson puzzle exploration game in which you play as a cat helping your human get through the day.

Meow at them
Bring them trash
Paw stuff
Poop

Explore to discover hidden corners of the house and complete the story.

Download: https://katekillick.itch.io/point-of-mew 

The Mini Indie Showcase 2023: https://youtu.be/ANsVkLxB3e0 

Learn more: https://sixoneindie.com/showcase
---------
